resources.string: Le Airbus A350 est un long-range, wide-body jet airliner developed by Airbus. The first A350 design proposed by Airbus in 2004, in response to the Boeing 787 Dreamliner, would have been a development of the A330 with composite wings and new engines. As market support was inadequate, in 2006, Airbus switched to a clean-sheet XWB (eXtra Wide Body) design, powered by Rolls-Royce Trent XWB turbofan engines.
